name: Anonymous
comment:
>>38008902
I'm not saying we kill him, I'm saying there's little point in us pussyfooting around here. He's going toe to toe with Liza so he's clearly a cut above us. Trying to separate them is just going to end with him escaping or us taking damage or whatnot.

We're far better off trying to wound him and step back to let Liza finish capturing as she sees fit than being the factor that lets him escape.
